title: How can we post dance or sing in an online Big Hit audition? - Quora

response.answer_text: If your talking about the announcement of girls group debuting in 2021 , the auditions aren’t held online it is in different countries like Singapore , Vietnam etc. in the month of october (I don’t remember the other countries lmao) But if you want to still audition for it search Belift lab auditions in google its a part of bighit only , there click on audition form and fill it out . If you want to send the dance video first record it and post it in your youtube channel and send the link in the audition form there will be a space to send the link and singing can be in audio , mp3 or something . Hope my answer helped you and all the best for your audtion!!! Good luck.

Hello! If you are interested in auditioning in Big Hit Ent. here’s the link to their website about online audition, it has all the details you need. Big Hit Audition | Big Hit Entertainment There are some criterias for the audition so look into it and cross-check. All the best!
